attributes.action: Discourage the Media from influencing economic 'Downturn'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please could the government stop the media from talking us into a recession, we are far off a recesion at present BUT if the constant barrage of negative media persists we may very well find ourselves mirred deep in one.  Guidance should be given on encouraging postive coverage as they are so quick to jump to the negative perspective which harms the economy further.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
